(Simplified: 嫱)
Chinese Definition:
①古代宮廷裏的女官名。妃、嬙的地位高於嬪、御。

嬙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiáng］
［《廣韻》在良切，平陽，從。］
［《廣韻》所力切，入職，生。］
“嫱1”的繁体字。
(1)古代宫内女官名。
(2)女子名用字。

嬙字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嬙； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页272第13
【唐韻】在良切【集韻】慈良切，?音牆。?嬙，婦官名。【晉語】備?嬙焉。【杜牧之·阿房宮賦】妃?媵嬙。　又女名。毛嬙，古美女。又王嬙，漢元帝宮人。【樂府·原題】嬙，齊國王穰女，漢元帝宮人，後遣嫁呼韓邪單于爲閼氏，號昭君。　又【集韻】徐羊切，音詳。女字。　又殺測切，音色。義同。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　嫱; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 272 13
[Tang Yun] In Liangqie [Jiyun] Kindly cut, sound wall. ? 嫱, the name of the woman official. [Jin Chinese] Prepare? [Du Muzhi·A Fanggong Fu] Concubine?　Also female name. Mao Qiang, ancient beauty. And Wang Qiang, a member of the imperial court of the Han and Yuan Dynasty. 【Yuefu·Original Title】嫱, King Rangnv of Qi, a member of the Palace of the Emperor of Han and Yuan Dynasty, was later married to Huhanxie Shanyu, named Zhaojun.　[Jiyun] Xu Yangqie, the sound is detailed. Female characters.　 Kill, test and cut again, timbre. The same meaning.
